name: Don't Mix! On Laundry Day
description:
When you were younger, you always wanted to become an entrepreneur. Now, at 31, it is time to stop living with your mother and pursue your life long dream.

Your strange but loving Uncle Gary offered to sell his troubling laundry business for $5000. Due to mechanical issues, only one washing machine is still usable.

Without much thought, you take out a loan and pursue your dream of owning a business!

Your goal is to repay your loan of $5000 by running a single machine laundrette.

Don't mix the colours! Keep your eyes open for what's being washed each day for a bonus! Washing the correct colour on a given day will earn you $5 per article of clothing (otherwise $1).

Avoid the cacti falling from the sky along with the clothes and use the money earned to upgrade your equipment.

Game made in 72 hours by Mikolaj Brzuhalski for Mini Jam 62: Colors.

Title screen drawn by Zoe Wood.

Controls:

  • Use the mouse to control the basket.
  • Use spacebar to insert washing into the washing machine and to collect it when the washing is finished.
  • Press E to interact with the Washing Machine and the Reset/Recycle Basket.
